name: The Lucky Dime Caper starring Donald Duck
name_original: The Lucky Dime Caper starring Donald Duck
description:
Sorceress Magica De Spell and her rotten ravens have kidnapped Huey, Dewey and Louie! Worse yet, she's snatched Ucle Scrooge's Lucky Dime! Join Donald Duck in his quest to prove that Magixa is no match for him.
Treck your way through treacherous lands of enchantment. Pick up objects along the route to fight Magica's creepy croonies. Thump mummies with hammers and hurl flying disks at snakes and poltergeists! Help save the three nephews and recover the powerful coin. Then sneak into Magica's haunted castle and try to outwit the wicked witch herself!

  • Search 7 lands of magic and danger!
  • Find special Keys to unlock secret rooms!
  • Grab Stars and Gems for extra power and points!
  • Speed through the levels for even higher scores!
